img_text: Y DRAGON や MPS-ENO05 [DIVINE-BEAST/EFFECT] Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned Send it to the GY. Gains 1000 ATK and DEF for each card in your hand.
